dict.string: Co-Fouder of Chogic Technology, Co-Creater of Time School App. Seed Funded by IDG Ventures. Mainly focused on iOS App development and backend data anaysis

Time School - Coolest social network exculsively for College student, connecting social medial with O2O service. Mainly focused on iOS App development and backend data anaysis(Apache Storm and Twitter Fabric)
Course Project, ranked No.1 of 20 teams in Operating System Course

– Completed Weenix kernel OS (Brown University) using C. Analyzed and implemented core functions in processes and threads, device drivers, virtual file system, System file system, and virtual memory system. – Hands-on experience with multi-threaded programming and low-level OS coding like system-level API calls, CPU scheduling and address mapping and translation.
Winner of USC Trojan Hackathon. Individual project.
iOS running game. Used Twitter Fabric, SKPhysicsBody, physicsWorld, SKAction, SKLabelNode and texture atlas to achieve features like run, jump, fly and share score to Twitter.
RunRunRun - Winner of USC Trojan Hackathon
Research Assistant in Cognition and Intelligent Computing Research Institute(HDU)

- Designed Computer-Aided Diagnosis system for murmur detection, tested and evaluated its performance by accuracy, sensitivity, and specificity. - Used Low Energy Rate as discriminating parameter to extract feature and calculated from recorded heart signal and performs binary classification of the sample as either normal or murmur. - Trained vector machine, output SVM model that describes optimized decision line for classification of evaluation. - Implemented signal acquisitions, algorithm and data visualization on Altera DE2.
Winner of Microsoft openhack2015. Social Media Connector of Facebook, Twitter and Weibo.

Used nodejs, HTML5/CSS3, BingTranslate, Ajax, their APIs to built web(https://ftd.herokuapp.com) to sync and update social media status,drag&drop moments to share from one to others,auto-translate status.
Social Media Connector, Winner of Microsoft Hackathon
